data.title: Moroccan students boycotted schools on Monday and took to the streets to continue their protests over the gruesome death of a 31-year-old fishmonger who was crushed to death inside a garbage truck as he was attempting to recover his fish after it was confiscated by authorities

No one has seen Kim Jon Un's wife for seven months

Ukraine stunned as vast cash reserves of political elite are made public
Nearly half of Russians fear Syria conflict could lead to World War III, poll finds
All porn sites to be blocked in Israel under new law that requires people to publicly ask for access

Nigerian soldiers, police sexually abuse Boko Haram victims, Human Rights Watch says

Aboriginal Australians, Pacific Islanders carry DNA of unknown human species, research analysis suggests: People from Papua New Guinea and north-east Australia carry small amounts of DNA of an unidentified, extinct human species, a new research analysis has suggested.
